note.p: Death: Heath field Lodge, Acton, Middlesex (02 January 1858)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1857-1859 vol 9 pp 547-549
Notes: BR gives birth date as 20 May 1798; Proc gives 1800. DNB is source for birth place and birth date.
References: R W Home, 'The Royal Society and the Empire: the colonial and Commonwealth Fellowship. Part 1. 1731-1847' in NR 2002 vol 56 pp 307-332
